Article.ArticleTitle: GuRhaGT, a highly specific saponin 2''-O-rhamnosyltransferase from Glycyrrhiza uralensis.

AbstractText: A highly regio- and donor-specific 2''-O-rhamnosyltransferase GuRhaGT was characterised from the medicinal plant Glycyrrhiza uralensis. GuRhaGT could efficiently catalyse rhamnosylation at 2''-OH of the C-3 glycosyl moiety of triterpenoid saponins.
